fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
Base:$18
1 Member:$90
2 Members:$120
3 Members:$550
4 Members:$750
5 Members:$900

Members cost $100 each

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Every 4 turns, the hunting moon shines upon the board, causing rent to be multiplied by however number of members there are plus one. (doubled with 1, tripled with 2, quadrupled with 3, ect.) If you have 5 members, anyone who lands on ANY of your properties will temporarily get a -6 debuff to their movement next turn if they land during a hunting moon.
